recipe.title: Healthier Instant Noodles In A Jar Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; mushroom, thinly sliced ; (20 g)
¼ cup ; carrot, cut into matchsticks ; (25 g)
½ cup ; fresh spinach, chopped ; (20 g)
1 cup ; dry instant noodle, such as vermicelli ; (100 g)
1 cup ; hot broth, or hot water ; (235 mL)

steps.step: Fill a mason jar with soy sauce, sesame oil, pepper, mushrooms, carrots, spinach, noodles, and green onions.
Store in the fridge for up to 5 days.
When you’re ready to serve, pour in the hot water or broth. Stir well.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Fill a mason jar with soy sauce, sesame oil, pepper, mushrooms, carrots, spinach, noodles, and green onions.
Store in the fridge for up to 5 days.
When you’re ready to serve, pour in the hot water or broth.
